comments.body: This java class does the encoding and it works with paths. It's not thorougly tested, but converted from some stable javascript code doing the same. BTW, the name is misleading, this class does not do any decoding yet ;-)

comments.body: Replaced the helper class with a new one that has a better name, some more javadoc and no longer includes stuff that does not belong there.

description: The utility class ISO9075 only allows you to encode and decode names. It should also have methods that allow you to pass a path. This is useful when a XPath query is created with a path constraint based on e.g. a Node.getPath().
